title: Enhancing Hospitality Competencies: Project-Based Learning (PBL) Design for Social Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can independently derive at least one PBL project topic by analyzing real-world social issues.
Learners can improve deliverables by incorporating peer feedback at least three times during the project process.
Learners can complete a visual portfolio representing project results using smartphone-based tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
